title: dedass font
content:
hey again,

just looking at the dedass website, what is their body text font? the one that looks pixelly (sp)?

thanks

 [‹ (x) BBC TopGear UK display typeface - Magistral {Geoff, Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165238/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38387 "Go to previous forum topic") [?? ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165238/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38402 "Go to next forum topic")
author: johnniboy

comments.content:
If you mean [this one](http://web.archive.org/web/20080706165238/http:/antiuser.org/dedass.png)...

It’s plain ol’ Verdana with antialiasing turned off.
how do you turn off the antialiasing of a font?

It depends on your application. That site uses Flash, and there’s an option in the Text Properties box to do it.

- Lex
